message: You're starting high, I'm starting low. Your turn to negotiate!
I'll meet you in the middle, but I still think I should get a bit more
I'm willing to compromise, but you're still giving me too little!
I'm getting closer to your offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more
You're getting closer, but I'm not going to give up my advantage yet!
I'm almost there, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while
I'm not budging, take it or leave it!
